languages.text: "Нет, смерть — слишком легкое наказание. Ты будешь жить и страдать от того, что так и не могла никого спасти".
"No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."
languages.original_text: "Нет, смерть — слишком легкое наказание. Ты будешь жить и страдать от того, что так и не могла никого спасти".

traits.locale_text: "No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in regret of being unable to save anyone."
"No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in regret of being unable to save anyone."
"No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in regret of being unable to save anyone."
"No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in regret of being unable to save anyone."
"No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."
"No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."

languages.text: «No, la muerte es un castigo demasiado suave para ti. Vivirás y sufrirás sabiendo que, pese a todos tus esfuerzos, no has podido salvar a nadie».
languages.original_text: "No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."

traits.locale_text: «No, la muerte es un castigo demasiado suave para ti. Vivirás y sufrirás lamentando no haber podido salvar a nadie».

languages.text: “不行，对你来说，死亡这样的惩罚太轻了。我要你活在痛苦之中，我要你时时刻刻明白这一点——哪怕你尽了一切努力，你也救不了任何人。”
languages.original_text: "No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."

traits.locale_text: “不行，对你来说，死亡这样的惩罚太轻了。你谁都没能救下来，我要你永远活在悔恨的折磨之中。”

languages.text: « Non, la mort serait trop douce pour vous. Vous vivrez, rongée par le regret de n'avoir pas pu sauver qui que ce soit malgré tous vos efforts. »
languages.original_text: "No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."

traits.locale_text: « Non, la mort serait trop douce pour vous. Vous vivrez, rongée par le regret de n'avoir pas pu sauver qui que ce soit malgré tous vos efforts. »

languages.text: 「いいや、死はお前にとって軽すぎる罰だ。どれほどに努力しようとも、誰も救えなかったことを悔やみ、苦しみながら生きていけ」
languages.original_text: "No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや、死はお前にとって軽すぎる罰だ。どれほどに努力しようとも、誰も救えなかったことを悔やみ、苦しみながら生きていけ」

languages.text: "Nein, der Tod ist für Euch eine zu leichte Strafe. Ihr werdet im Wissen leben und leiden, dass Ihr trotz all Eurer Bemühungen niemanden retten konntet."
languages.original_text: "No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, der Tod ist für Euch eine zu leichte Strafe. Ihr werdet leben und ewig unter der Reue leiden, dass Ihr niemanden retten konntet."

languages.text: "Hayır, ölüm senin için çok hafif bir ceza. Tüm çabalarına rağmen tek bir kişiyi bile kurtaramadığını bilerek yaşayacak ve acı çekeceksin."
languages.original_text: "No, death is too light a punishment for you. You will live and suffer in the knowledge that, despite all your efforts, you could not save anyone."
